data.title: intern
data.name: Axon Inc.
description: Front-end and Back-end engineer
Created several websites (front-end + back-end) using multiple frameworks.
Built a business inteligence system that will extract metrics from Facebook and Instagram, and save it in a database. Using this accumulated data, I have also built a visualization system.
